nodes.text: R3-B0017 was an R3-series astromech droid that was programmed to scavenge the planet Dathomir and serve the Dathomirian Zabrak Darth Maul. The droid was equipped with green durasteel plating.

The droid was equipped with a red sensor, a primary photoreceptor, radar eyes, a Herner optical holographic projector, a Burtt acoustic signaler, a processor state indicator, system ventilation, a hi-power recharge coupling, hydraulic arm shafts, a heat exhaust, a cargo compartment, system lubricant filter reservoirs, and an accentuating coupler.

R3-B0017 was sold at Disney Parks in September and October of 2017 for a Halloween-themed exclusive toy as part of the Star Wars: Droid Factory toy line. It was mostly made of green, "glow in the dark" plastic, which was based of the green mist from the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes set on Dathomir. A similarly-named Halloween-themed droid, R2-B00, was released in 2016.
